name: styleguides-etc
description: Presentation and demo's by Norbert de Langen

scripts.presentation:build: cd spectacle && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.production.js
scripts.presentation:deploy: cd spectacle && npm run presentation:clean & npm run presentation:build && surge -p .
scripts.presentation:start: cd spectacle && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node server.js
scripts.sourcejs-showcase:start: cd sourcejs-showcase && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run start -- -p 8080
scripts.sourcejs-react:start: cd sourcejs-react && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run start -- -p 8081
scripts.storybook:start: cd storybook && cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run storybook
scripts.start: pm2 start npm --name "sourcejs" -- run sourcejs-react:start && pm2 start npm --name "storybook" -- run storybook:start && pm2 start npm --name "presentation" -- run presentation:start

author: Norbert de Langen
